meanings.definition: To perform a vasectomy on (a male)
meanings.sent1: The doctor will vasectomize the patient to prevent future pregnancies.
meanings.sent2: After discussing with his partner, John decided to vasectomize for birth control.
meanings.sent3: Why did the comedian say he wanted to vasectomize his alarm clock? To stop it from making baby noises!
meanings.sent4: The decision to vasectomize his career by quitting his stable job was a bold move.
meanings.sent5: The image of the surgeon carefully vasectomizing the tiny tubes was both fascinating and educational.

meanings.sent1: Mark will vasectomize next week to ensure he doesn't have more children.
meanings.sent2: Many men choose to vasectomize as a permanent form of birth control.
meanings.sent3: The thought of having to vasectomize made Tom nervous, but he knew it was the right decision.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she needed to vasectomize her cluttered closet to simplify her life.
meanings.sent5: The idea of vasectomizing his future plans for the sake of his family weighed heavily on his mind.
